alternativeNames: Kawamoto, Daigen; Chong, Tae-hyun; Chong, T'ae-hyon; Chung, Tai Hyun; Chong, Tai-hioni
comments: Korean botanist who published in Japanese as  'Kawamoto, Daigen'.
examples: Rosa silenidiflora Nakai ex T.Kawamoto in Bull. Natl. Sci. Mus., Tokyo, 29: 94 (1950).
source: R.Pankhurst.  Dates from J. Korean Pl. Taxon., 12(2): 91 (1982) and W.Lee, Lineamenta Flora Koreae 1: VII (1996) (date of death 1972 in this publication).
